title: Amy Called Out For Not Wearing Wedding Ring + Lauren Alaina Drops Big Relationship News Ahead Of DWTS Premiere + Movie Soundtrack Game
itunes:title: Amy Called Out For Not Wearing Wedding Ring + Lauren Alaina Drops Big Relationship News Ahead Of DWTS Premiere + Movie Soundtrack Game
description:
Amy got called out by listeners on Facebook for not wearing her wedding ring and Bobby gives an update on him saying he’d be married by December. Lauren Alaina calls us to talk about the Dancing With The Stars premiere and gives a breaking relationship update. We play the movie soundtrack game where you have to guess the movie. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
